solution_line_template: After the accident, Mike can only type {initial_typing_speed} words/minute - {speed_reduction} words/minute = <<{initial_typing_speed}-{speed_reduction}={new_typing_speed}>>{new_typing_speed} words/minute.
So, he will be able to finish typing the document in {document_length} words / {new_typing_speed} words/minute = <<{document_length}/{new_typing_speed}={time_to_finish}>>{time_to_finish} minutes.
